FOOTER.NO_SPAM: Get occasional insights, tips, and updates — no spam.
FOOTER.SLOGAN: We turn ideas into high-performing digital products.

HOME.HERO_TITLE: We build digital products that help businesses grow
HOME.HERO_SUBTITLE: Our team of experienced developers and designers crafts beautiful, functional websites and applications tailored to your needs
HOME.HERO_DESCRIPTION_1: Our framework component is built to handle scaling demands with agility.
HOME.FAQ_SUBTITLE: Not sure how it all works? Here's what most of our clients ask us first.

QUESTIONS.COST: How much does a website cost?
QUESTIONS.STARTUPS: Do you work with startups or small businesses?
QUESTIONS.SUPPORT: What if I need help after the site is launched?
QUESTIONS.INVOLVEMENT: How involved will I be in the process?
QUESTIONS.REDESIGNS: Do you offer redesigns or only full builds?

ANSWERS.COST: Pricing depends on the project's scope, features, and complexity. After a discovery call, we provide a custom quote tailored to your needs — no hidden fees, just transparent pricing.
ANSWERS.STARTUPS: Absolutely. Whether you're just launching or scaling up, we tailor each project to fit your business goals, size, and stage.
ANSWERS.SUPPORT: We offer ongoing support, updates, and growth-focused improvements. Whether it's bug fixes, feature updates, or scaling — we've got you covered.
ANSWERS.INVOLVEMENT: We keep things collaborative. You'll be involved in key decisions — from early ideas to design approvals — with regular updates and progress reviews.
ANSWERS.REDESIGNS: We do both. Whether you're starting from scratch or refreshing an existing site, we can help improve performance, design, and user experience.

CTA.TITLE: Still Have Questions?
CTA.DESCRIPTION: We're happy to walk you through the process — no pressure, no tech jargon.

FEATURES.TITLE: Features
FEATURES.SUB_TITLE: At Koober Coders, we combine cutting-edge technology, real-world experience, and a personalized approach to bring your digital ideas to life. Here's what sets us apart from the rest:

MODERN_TECH.TITLE: Modern Technologies
MODERN_TECH.DESCRIPTION: We use the latest, stable technology stack to ensure high performance, security, and scalability for every project.

EXPERIENCED_TEAM.TITLE: Experienced Team
EXPERIENCED_TEAM.DESCRIPTION: Our developers bring years of hands-on experience solving complex problems with clean, maintainable code.

AGILE_PROCESS.TITLE: Flexible (Agile) Processes
AGILE_PROCESS.DESCRIPTION: We follow Agile methodology — delivering fast, adapting quickly to change, and keeping you in the loop every step of the way.

PERSONAL_APPROACH.TITLE: Personalized Approach
PERSONAL_APPROACH.DESCRIPTION: No copy-paste templates here. Every solution is tailored to your business goals, industry, and vision.

RESULT_ORIENTED.TITLE: Result-Oriented
RESULT_ORIENTED.DESCRIPTION: Our job isn't done until your business grows. We focus on impact — not just deliverables.

TRANSPARENT_COMM.TITLE: Transparent Communication
TRANSPARENT_COMM.DESCRIPTION: You'll always know what's happening. We believe in regular updates, honest feedback, and real collaboration.

CTA.TITLE: Let's Build Something Great
CTA.SUBTITLE: Tell us your challenge — we'll help solve it.

HOW_WE_WORK.TITLE: How we work
HOW_WE_WORK.SUB_TITLE: From concept to launch, we follow a proven methodology that delivers results.
HOW_WE_WORK.MOBILE_MAIN_TITLE: Quality. Growth. Success. Our Process Covers It All.
HOW_WE_WORK.MOBILE_SUB_TITLE: From first idea to final launch (and beyond), our process is clear, collaborative, and focused on real results. Here's how we bring your vision to life — step by step.

USER_EXPERIENCE.TITLE: Better User Experience
USER_EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: Intuitive and fast products will increase your customer satisfaction and loyalty.

FUTURE_PROOF.TITLE: Future-Proof Solutions

SERVICES.SUBTITLE: We provide a wide range of digital services to help your business thrive
SERVICES.HEADING_DESCRIPTION: We build scalable, fast, and beautifully crafted web solutions — designed for real business growth, not just good looks.
SERVICES.CTA_TITLE: Ready to Build Something That Lasts?
SERVICES.CTA_DESCRIPTION: From idea to launch — and beyond — we're here to help you create digital experiences that make a difference.

WEB_APP.TITLE: Web Application Development
WEB_APP.DESCRIPTION: We build complex, fast, and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs.
WEB_APP.GET_DESCRIPTION: High-performance custom platforms that match your specific workflows, goals, and growth plans.
WEB_APP.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → Modern tech stack for stability and scalability→ Agile approach for flexible delivery→ Full-cycle development — from discovery to launch and support
WEB_APP.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION:
Discovery → 1–2 weeks
Design & Prototyping → 2–4 weeks
Development & Testing → 4–12+ weeks
Launch & Monitoring → 1 week
Support & Growth → Ongoing

MOBILE_APP.TITLE: Mobile App Development (iOS/Android)
MOBILE_APP.DESCRIPTION: We build complex, fast, and scalable web applications tailored to your business needs.
MOBILE_APP.GET_DESCRIPTION: Beautiful, fast, and intuitive mobile apps, built natively or cross-platform, depending on your needs.
MOBILE_APP.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → UX-focused approach to maximize engagement→ Agile development for faster iteration→ Transparent communication and regular progress updates
MOBILE_APP.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION:
Discovery → 1–2 weeks
Design & Prototyping → 2–4 weeks
Development & Testing → 4–12+ weeks
Launch & Monitoring → 1 week
Support & Growth → Ongoing

UI_UX.TITLE: UI/UX Design & Prototyping
UI_UX.DESCRIPTION: We create intuitive and visually appealing designs that ensure the best User Experience.
UI_UX.GET_DESCRIPTION: User-centered designs that are both beautiful and functional — plus interactive prototypes to visualize the end product.
UI_UX.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → User-first design philosophy→ Data-informed UX decisions→ Iterative approach with regular feedback cycles
UI_UX.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION:
Discovery & Research → 1–2 weeks
Wireframing & User Flows → 1–2 weeks
Visual Design & UI → 2–3 weeks
Prototyping & Testing → 1–2 weeks

CUSTOM_SOFTWARE.TITLE: Custom Software Development
CUSTOM_SOFTWARE.DESCRIPTION: If off-the-shelf solutions don't work for you, we will build unique software for your specific processes.
CUSTOM_SOFTWARE.GET_DESCRIPTION: Tailor-made software that fits your exact business processes and integrates with your existing systems.
CUSTOM_SOFTWARE.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → Process-driven approach→ Modular, extensible architecture→ Comprehensive documentation and training
CUSTOM_SOFTWARE.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION:
Analysis & Planning → 2–4 weeks
Architecture & Design → 2–4 weeks
Development & Integration → 8–16+ weeks
Testing & QA → 2–4 weeks
Deployment & Training → 1–2 weeks

TECH_CONSULTING.TITLE: Technical Consulting & Audit
TECH_CONSULTING.DESCRIPTION: Analyze your existing systems and receive professional recommendations for their improvement.
TECH_CONSULTING.GET_DESCRIPTION: A full technical review of your systems, codebase, and tools — plus strategic advice to improve performance and scale.
TECH_CONSULTING.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → Experienced team with real-world dev insight→ Honest, actionable recommendations→ Business-first thinking to align tech with your goals
TECH_CONSULTING.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION: Short-term engagement based on system size (typically 1–2 weeks)

POST_LAUNCH.TITLE: Post-Launch Support
POST_LAUNCH.DESCRIPTION: Our partnership doesn't end at launch. We offer ongoing technical support and development.
POST_LAUNCH.GET_DESCRIPTION: Continued collaboration to support your digital product — from small fixes to new features and scalability planning.
POST_LAUNCH.STRENGTHS_DESCRIPTION: → Fast response time→ Long-term product ownership→ Proactive improvements based on real user data
POST_LAUNCH.TIMELINE_DESCRIPTION: Ongoing — support packages tailored to your needs
